CustomField.description: Defines if Non-System Admin Users are allowed to create Invoices with an Invoice Date later than the current date. If True, Non-System Admin Users can not create Invoices for future dates. System Admin will be allowed to create Invoices for all dates
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if Non-System Admin Users are allowed to create Invoices with an Invoice Date later than the current date. If True, Non-System Admin Users can not create Invoices for future dates. System Admin will be allowed to create Invoices for all dates
CustomField.label: Prevent Future Invoices
